portfolio.title: News-app
portfolio.description: News Explorer is a user-friendly and dynamic news application designed to keep you informed and up-to-date with the latest news from around the world. Developed with a combination of HTML, CSS, and API integration, this application offers a seamless and visually appealing experience for users seeking reliable news sources.

portfolio.title: QR-CODEGENERATOR
portfolio.description: Introducing the QR Code Generator, a versatile and user-friendly web application crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with seamless API integration. This project empowers users to generate QR codes effortlessly, providing a convenient and efficient solution for various applications.

portfolio.title: Scientific-calculator
portfolio.description: Welcome to the Scientific Calculator App, a powerful and feature-rich calculator designed and developed using Android Studio. This application brings the capabilities of a scientific calculator to the palm of your hands, providing an intuitive and efficient tool for a wide range of mathematical computations.
